name: laminas/laminas-feed
description: provides functionality for consuming RSS and Atom feeds

suggest.laminas/laminas-cache: Laminas\Cache component, for optionally caching feeds between requests
suggest.laminas/laminas-db: Laminas\Db component, for use with PubSubHubbub
suggest.laminas/laminas-http: Laminas\Http for PubSubHubbub, and optionally for use with Laminas\Feed\Reader
suggest.laminas/laminas-servicemanager: Laminas\ServiceManager component, for easily extending ExtensionManager implementations
suggest.laminas/laminas-validator: Laminas\Validator component, for validating email addresses used in Atom feeds and entries ehen using the Writer subcomponent
suggest.psr/http-message: PSR-7 ^1.0, if you wish to use Laminas\Feed\Reader\Http\Psr7ResponseDecorator
